text: SKEMA Business School is a European higher studies establishment. The school is in 7 places, in Suresnes, in Lille, in Belo Horizonte, in Sophia Antipolis, in Raleigh, in Suzhou and in Cape Town.Sun, sea and school It has been created in 2009 and therefore presents itself as "At Home Worldwide". SKEMA is specialist in the fields of economics, social sciences and management.Avec l'AMBA, Skema décroche la triple accréditation ==References== == Further reading == * SKEMA website Category:Education in France
title: SKEMA Business School
